can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])

sentences.english: Mr. Gong on Zhongguancun domestically produced software press conference.
sentences.chinese: 在中關村“國產軟件一樣好用”發佈會上。

sentences.english: Ha ha. I bet they play this and then announce the event is over.
sentences.chinese: 哈，我打包票他們演奏完後宣佈發佈會結束。

sentences.english: He has refused to take part in TV debates or give press conferences.
sentences.chinese: 他拒絕參加電視辯論，也不召開新聞發佈會。

sentences.english: The press-conference room adjacent to the mixed-zone was just as crazy.
sentences.chinese: 靠近混合區的新聞發佈會大廳同樣狂熱。

sentences.english: A couple days ago she attended the P&G Communitys new product release press conference.
sentences.chinese: 前兩天她還剛剛出席了寶潔公司的一次新品發佈會。

sentences.english: I translated for him at the ceremony yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 我昨天在發佈會上擔任他的翻譯。

sentences.english: European Inter-bank lending rates fell after the ECB's press conference.
sentences.chinese: 央行新聞發佈會召開之後歐洲銀行間拆借利率下跌。

sentences.english: This is a dissertation on observing the Press Conference through a visual angle of communication.
sentences.chinese: 這是一篇從宣傳學的視角觀察新聞發佈會的論文。

sentences.english: The announcement was made in an impromptu press conference at the airport.
sentences.chinese: 這一宣佈是在機場舉行的臨時新聞發佈會上作出的。

sentences.english: Jaafari is a news conference the same day made the stand.
sentences.chinese: 賈法裏是在當天的一個新聞發佈會上作上述表態的。

sentences.english: More on that news conference by Chief Cabinet Secretary Yukio Edano.
sentences.chinese: 內閣官房長官枝野幸男在新聞發佈會上還說了更多。

sentences.english: Members from the drafting group introduce the mock policy address during a press conference.
sentences.chinese: 起草小組成員於新聞發佈會上介紹模擬施政報告。

sentences.english: Some of these hoaxes will be put together into a pseudo-haiku news conference.
sentences.chinese: 一些惡作劇者將這些俳句拼湊成一個僞新聞發佈會。

sentences.english: The Microsoft E3 press conference kicks off on the morning of Monday, June 6.
sentences.chinese: 微軟新聞發佈會將於6月6日星期一早上開始。

sentences.english: On the newspaper session, seven jadeite kings still announced tomorrow's game rule.
sentences.chinese: 新聞發佈會上，七個翡翠王還公佈了明天的比賽規則。

sentences.english: Don't talk like a press release. Talk like a person.
sentences.chinese: 說話別跟開記者發佈會似的，像人一樣說話。

definition: to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
